    • Method Detail

      • getSpout

        public static org.apache.storm.topology.IRichSpout getSpout(String className,
                                                            List<String> args)
                                                     throws Exception
        Creates and initializes an instance of IRichSpout using a constructor that takes a List of String arguments or the default constructor if one is not available.
        Parameters:
        className - The name of the spout class to load.
        args - The arguments to pass to its constructor that matches this type if it has one.
        Returns:
        A created instance of this spout class.
        Throws:
        Exception - if there were issues creating or instantiating this spout.

      • registerMetricsConsumer

        public static void registerMetricsConsumer(String className,
                                           org.apache.storm.Config stormConfig,
                                           BulletStormConfig bulletConfig)
        Creates an instance of a custom IMetricsConsumer to add for custom metrics logging for the topology. It then calls a static method with the signature register(Config, BulletStormConfig) to let that class define any custom metrics and parallelisms etc using the BulletStormConfig into the Storm Config.
        Parameters:
        className - The name of the custom IMetricsConsumer.
        stormConfig - The Storm configuration that would be used by the register method.
        bulletConfig - The Bullet configuration to pass to the register method.

      • isIMetricsConsumer

        public static boolean isIMetricsConsumer(String className)
        Checks to see if the given class name is an instance of a custom IMetricsConsumer that can be used in the topology. That class must define a static method with the signature register(Config, BulletStormConfig) to let that class define any custom metrics and parallelisms etc using the BulletStormConfig into the Storm Config.
        Parameters:
        className - The name of the custom IMetricsConsumer.
        Returns:
        A boolean denoting whether the class represented by the name is a valid custom metrics consumer.
